_meta.description: Feature tracking for HR Command Center. Status: not-started | in-progress | pass | fail | blocked

basic-chat-ui.notes: All components complete: AppShell, ChatInput, MessageBubble, MessageList, TypingIndicator

claude-api-integration.notes: All tasks complete (1.4.1-1.4.6). Streaming responses working.

network-detection.notes: Hybrid detection (browser events + API check), amber indicator in header

employee-data.notes: 2.1.1-2.1.21 complete: Schema, CRUD, file parser, import UIs, test data generation + import. 100 employees, 237 ratings, 237 reviews, 221 eNPS imported with verified FK integrity.

company-profile.notes: 2.2.1-2.2.4 complete: company.rs CRUD, CompanySetup component, gated onboarding flow. State = HQ/incorporation (single), employee work states tracked separately.

context-builder.notes: 2.3.1-2.3.6 + 2.7.0-2.7.5 complete: context.rs, Alex persona, employee context, user_name, token budget, selected employee prioritization, OrgAggregates, classify_query(), query-adaptive retrieval, system prompt with aggregates. 63 context tests passing.

cross-conversation-memory.notes: 2.4.1-2.4.4 complete: memory.rs (8 tests), useConversationSummary hook, Tauri commands, Cmd+N shortcut. Summaries generated on new conversation.

conversation-management.notes: Complete: Backend CRUD (7 commands, 7 tests), ConversationContext (auto-save, auto-title), tabbed sidebar UI (ConversationSidebar, TabSwitcher, ConversationCard, ConversationSearch).

stickiness-features.notes: 2.6.1-2.6.3 complete: PromptSuggestions component, usePromptSuggestions hook, contextual empty state guidance. Three context modes: empty (setup), general (team), employee-selected (personalized).

pii-scanner.notes: 3.1.1-3.1.5 complete: pii.rs with SSN, credit card (Visa/MC/Amex/Discover), bank account detection. Luhn validation for CC, context keywords for bank accounts. 31 unit tests passing.

auto-redaction.notes: 3.2.1-3.2.3 complete: scan_pii Tauri command, frontend integration in ConversationContext.sendMessage(), user sees redacted text in message bubble

pii-notification-ui.notes: 3.3.1-3.3.3 complete: PIINotification component, amber slide-in banner, 3s auto-dismiss, X to close early

audit-logging.notes: 3.4.1-3.4.4 complete: audit.rs (11 tests), 5 Tauri commands, TS wrappers, frontend integration. Logs redacted requests, responses, employee IDs. CSV export support.

error-handling.notes: 3.5.1-3.5.4 complete: ErrorMessage component, error categorization (6 types), Retry/Copy actions, offline mode in ChatInput. error-utils.ts for categorization.

onboarding-flow.notes: 7-step wizard complete: Welcome, API Key, Company, Employees (auto-loads sample), Disclaimer, Telemetry, First Prompt. 11 files, ~1,100 LOC.

settings-panel.notes: Modal with API key, company profile, data path display, telemetry toggle. ~200 LOC, 6 files. Fixed onboarding context bug.

data-export-import.notes: AES-256-GCM encrypted backups with Argon2 key derivation. Full backup of all 9 tables. ~800 LOC Rust, ~280 LOC React. 6 unit tests.

monday-digest.notes: 4.4.1-4.4.4 complete: MondayDigest component, useMondayDigest hook, find_recent_hires query, get_digest_data command. Shows anniversaries (7 days) and new hires (90 days) on first launch of week. ~330 LOC across 8 files.

api-key-setup-guide.notes: V2.1.1a-e complete: Plain-language explainer, step-by-step guide, contextual error hints (OpenAI vs Anthropic detection), cost estimator, troubleshooting FAQ. 3 files, ~280 new LOC.

command-palette.notes: V2.1.2a-d complete: CommandPalette with Fuse.js fuzzy search, useCommandPalette hook, shortcuts (⌘K, ⌘/, ⌘E, ⌘,), keyboard hints in header. 2 new files, ~405 LOC.

persona-switcher.notes: V2.1.3a-d complete: 5 personas (Alex, Jordan, Sam, Morgan, Taylor), PersonaSelector component, Settings integration, immediate effect. ~270 LOC across 6 files, 4 new tests.

pause-1a.notes: Phase 1 complete: App runs, API key works, streaming chat, network detection

pause-2a.notes: Phase 2 complete: Context injection, query-adaptive retrieval, employee disambiguation, search debouncing all verified

pause-3a.notes: Phase 3 verified: PII redaction, notification, audit logging, error handling, offline mode all working

pause-4a.notes: Phase 4A verified: Onboarding flow + Settings panel both complete and tested
